title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge maintenance between Mt Sicker Rd and Fuller Lake Rd for 3.7 km (Chemainus). Lane closures in both directions. Construction speed zone in effect. Southbound bridge closed for repairs. All Traffic diverted onto the adjacent bridge. No overwidth protocols in effect up to 4.4m. Next update time Mon Jan 20, 2025 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 9:22 PM PST. (DBC-70685)

title: Highway 1 Eastbound
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), eastbound. Stalled vehicle between Port Mann East Service Rd and Exit 48: 152 St (Surrey). Right lane is blocked. Expect delays. Next update time Wed Dec 11 at 4:30 PM PST. Last updated Wed Dec 11 at 4:01 PM PST. (DBC-71052)

title: Highway 1 Eastbound
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), eastbound. Road cleared between 208 St and 216th St (Langley - District). Last updated Wed Dec 11 at 4:13 PM PST. (DBC-71051)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Sun Dec 15 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 25 at 10:06 AM PST. (DBC-64961)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays. Bridge closed. Full closure 9AM-3PM weekdays except Wednesday. Alternate route via Hwy 97A (Sicamous) / 97B (Salmon Arm) Single lane alternating traffic from 8PM-6AM PST, expect 20 min delays. Next update time Sun Dec 15 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Sun Dec 8 at 4:53 PM PST. (DBC-70490)

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification. Mon-Fri essential service Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Sat-Sun Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 9:40PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 10:20PM. Essential service travelers board 1st, then general public. Emergency services accommodated. Next update time Fri Dec 13 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Wed Dec 11 at 8:35 AM PST. (DBC-69872)

title: McLure Ferry Both Directions
description: McLure Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is currently out of service between McLure Ferry and the end of McLure Ferry (McLure). Until Sat Dec 14 at 7:00 AM PST. Estimated time of re-opening Sat Dec 14 at 7:00 AM PST. Next update time Sat Dec 14 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 10 at 11:04 AM PST. (DBC-71007)

title: Other Roads
description: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. Landslide at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection. Road closed. A temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road. Next update time Mon Apr 14, 2025 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 9 at 5:50 PM PST. (DBC-23443)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Durrell Road, in both directions. Landslide at 700m from Highway 97. Road closed. Detour in effect. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road. Next update time Wed Apr 23, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 1:06 PM PDT. (DBC-27390)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Quesnel-Hixon Road, in both directions. Landslide at Cottonwood bridge. Road closed. Next update time Thu Apr 17, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 2:46 PM PDT. (DBC-28386)

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: McKay Road, in both directions. Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed. Next update time Thu Apr 10, 2025 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 10 at 9:04 AM PST. (DBC-53013)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Canal Rd, in both directions. Construction work at Mt Norman Access Rd. From 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM PST daily. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Road closed. Night work will begin on November 13th. 5 ton load limit and one vehicle per light until 4 PM, Friday, December 13th, 2024. Next update time Fri Dec 13 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 10 at 7:30 AM PST. (DBC-61149)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Cave Road, in both directions. Landslide at Quesnel-Hixon Road. Road closed. Landslide on Cave Road. Next update time Tue Apr 1, 2025 at 10:00 AM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 9 at 10:17 AM PDT. (DBC-67913)

title: Other Roads
description: Red Bridge. Bridge closed between Athabasca Street and Lorne Street 1 km north of Kamloops. Bridge damaged. Detour in effect. Detour via Highway 5. Next update time Tue Dec 31 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 7:55 AM PDT. (DBC-68412)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Pavilion Clinton Rd, in both directions. Travel advisory in effect between Clinton and Lillooet 60 km south of Lillooet. Road closed for the season. Pavilion-Clinton Rd is closed for the Winter. Next update time Fri May 16, 2025 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 12 at 9:23 AM PST. (DBC-70161)
